name: Organization
description: An organization such as a school, NGO, corporation, club, etc.
title: Organization

fields.name: serviceArea
fields.title: serviceArea
fields.description: The geographic area where the service is provided.

fields.name: funder
fields.title: funder
fields.description: A person or organization that supports (sponsors) something through some kind of financial contribution.

fields.name: areaServed
fields.title: areaServed
fields.description: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided.

fields.name: memberOf
fields.title: memberOf
fields.description: An Organization (or ProgramMembership) to which this Person or Organization belongs.

fields.name: events
fields.title: events
fields.description: Upcoming or past events associated with this place or organization.

fields.name: subOrganization
fields.title: subOrganization
fields.description: A relationship between two organizations where the first includes the second, e.g., as a subsidiary. See also: the more specific 'department' property.

fields.name: hasOfferCatalog
fields.title: hasOfferCatalog
fields.description: Indicates an OfferCatalog listing for this Organization, Person, or Service.

fields.name: globalLocationNumber
fields.title: globalLocationNumber
fields.description: The Global Location Number (GLN, sometimes also referred to as International Location Number or ILN) of the respective organization, person, or place. The GLN is a 13-digit number used to identify parties and physical locations.

fields.name: reviews
fields.title: reviews
fields.description: Review of the item.

fields.name: members
fields.title: members
fields.description: A member of this organization.

fields.name: taxID
fields.title: taxID
fields.description: The Tax / Fiscal ID of the organization or person, e.g. the TIN in the US or the CIF/NIF in Spain.

fields.name: award
fields.title: award
fields.description: An award won by or for this item.

fields.name: makesOffer
fields.title: makesOffer
fields.description: A pointer to products or services offered by the organization or person.

fields.name: contactPoints
fields.title: contactPoints
fields.description: A contact point for a person or organization.

fields.name: awards
fields.title: awards
fields.description: Awards won by or for this item.

fields.name: seeks
fields.title: seeks
fields.description: A pointer to products or services sought by the organization or person (demand).

fields.name: member
fields.title: member
fields.description: A member of an Organization or a ProgramMembership. Organizations can be members of organizations; ProgramMembership is typically for individuals.

fields.name: founders
fields.title: founders
fields.description: A person who founded this organization.

fields.name: alumni
fields.title: alumni
fields.description: Alumni of an organization.

fields.name: dissolutionDate
fields.title: dissolutionDate
fields.description: The date that this organization was dissolved.

fields.name: address
fields.title: address
fields.description: Physical address of the item.

fields.name: logo
fields.title: logo
fields.description: An associated logo.

fields.name: employees
fields.title: employees
fields.description: People working for this organization.

fields.name: telephone
fields.title: telephone
fields.description: The telephone number.

fields.name: email
fields.title: email
fields.description: Email address.

fields.name: department
fields.title: department
fields.description: A relationship between an organization and a department of that organization, also described as an organization (allowing different urls, logos, opening hours). For example: a store with a pharmacy, or a bakery with a cafe.

fields.name: contactPoint
fields.title: contactPoint
fields.description: A contact point for a person or organization.

fields.name: parentOrganization
fields.title: parentOrganization
fields.description: The larger organization that this organization is a subOrganization of, if any.

fields.name: legalName
fields.title: legalName
fields.description: The official name of the organization, e.g. the registered company name.

fields.name: foundingDate
fields.title: foundingDate
fields.description: The date that this organization was founded.

fields.name: employee
fields.title: employee
fields.description: Someone working for this organization.

fields.name: numberOfEmployees
fields.title: numberOfEmployees
fields.description: The number of employees in an organization e.g. business.

fields.name: naics
fields.title: naics
fields.description: The North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) code for a particular organization or business person.

fields.name: hasPOS
fields.title: hasPOS
fields.description: Points-of-Sales operated by the organization or person.

fields.name: review
fields.title: review
fields.description: A review of the item.

fields.name: foundingLocation
fields.title: foundingLocation
fields.description: The place where the Organization was founded.

fields.name: owns
fields.title: owns
fields.description: Products owned by the organization or person.

fields.name: event
fields.title: event
fields.description: Upcoming or past event associated with this place, organization, or action.

fields.name: founder
fields.title: founder
fields.description: A person who founded this organization.

fields.name: publishingPrinciples
fields.title: publishingPrinciples
fields.description:
The publishingPrinciples property indicates (typically via URL) a document describing the editorial principles of an Organization (or individual e.g. a Person writing a blog) that relate to their activities as a publisher, e.g. ethics or diversity policies. When applied to a CreativeWork (e.g. NewsArticle) the principles are those of the party primarily responsible for the creation of the CreativeWork.

While such policies are most typically expressed in natural language, sometimes related information (e.g. indicating a funder) can be expressed using schema.org terminology.

fields.name: sponsor
fields.title: sponsor
fields.description: A person or organization that supports a thing through a pledge, promise, or financial contribution. e.g. a sponsor of a Medical Study or a corporate sponsor of an event.

fields.name: isicV4
fields.title: isicV4
fields.description: The International Standard of Industrial Classification of All Economic Activities (ISIC), Revision 4 code for a particular organization, business person, or place.

fields.name: location
fields.title: location
fields.description: The location of for example where the event is happening, an organization is located, or where an action takes place.

fields.name: brand
fields.title: brand
fields.description: The brand(s) associated with a product or service, or the brand(s) maintained by an organization or business person.

fields.name: vatID
fields.title: vatID
fields.description: The Value-added Tax ID of the organization or person.

fields.name: leiCode
fields.title: leiCode
fields.description: An organization identifier that uniquely identifies a legal entity as defined in ISO 17442.

fields.name: faxNumber
fields.title: faxNumber
fields.description: The fax number.
